general: Use 'Manrope' for all headings and 'Inter' for body text.
Implement a 'Mobile-First' approach. Ensure touch targets are at least 44px.
Use the 'Bento' grid layout for the Categories section on the homepage.
For the 'Ad Details' page, use a sticky sidebar for the 'Contact Owner' card on desktop.
Ensure all forms (Upload Ad, Login) use Shadcn Form components with Zod validation.
Use 'Sonner' for all toast notifications (Success, Error).
Do NOT use generic gradients. Use the specific 'premium' and 'hot' gradients defined in colors.

theme.strategy: Use a clean white background (#FFFFFF) for cards and a slightly off-white (#FAFAFA) for the page background to create depth.

components.navigation: Create a bottom tab bar for mobile and a top navbar for desktop.
components.cards: Listing cards must have an image slider (use Swiper or similar) if multiple images exist.
components.chat: The chat interface should look like WhatsApp/Messenger - clean bubbles, distinct colors for sender/receiver.

universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
